title: 현재와 미래 관련 어휘
description: 현재 활동과 미래 계획을 표현하는 데 필요한 동사와 표현을 배웁니다.

words.example: I am studying for my exam.
She is working on a new project.
We are planning a trip to Europe.
I am going to visit my grandparents.
We're traveling to Japan next month.
words.exampleMeaning: 우리는 다음 달에 일본으로 여행할 예정이다.

words.example: The train is leaving in five minutes.
We will arrive at the airport at 6 PM.
I'm starting a new job next week.
words.exampleMeaning: 나는 다음 주에 새 직장을 시작한다.

words.example: I will finish my homework tonight.
words.exampleMeaning: 나는 오늘 밤 숙제를 끝낼 것이다.

words.example: We're going to continue this discussion tomorrow.
words.exampleMeaning: 우리는 내일 이 논의를 계속할 것이다.

words.example: I'm trying to improve my English.
words.exampleMeaning: 나는 영어 실력을 향상시키려고 노력하고 있다.

words.example: They are developing a new app.

additionalExamples.sentence: I want to develop my skills.

words.example: Scientists predict that the climate will change.
I promise I will be there on time.
words.exampleMeaning: 나는 제시간에 거기 있을 것을 약속한다.

words.example: We are going to decide tomorrow.
I am currently working from home.
I hope you feel better soon.

confusableWords.difference: Hope는 가능한 것, Wish는 불가능한 것

words.example: I expect him to arrive at 5.

additionalExamples.sentence: I learn something new every day.

words.example: We're moving to a new house.
I usually go to bed at 11.
I often exercise in the morning.

exercises.question: What is the -ing form of 'plan'?
exercises.explanation: 'plan'은 짧은 동사(CVC)이므로 'n'을 한 번 더 쓰고 -ing를 붙입니다.

exercises.question: I am _____ (meet) my friend tomorrow.
exercises.explanation: 확정된 계획을 현재진행형으로 표현: am meeting

exercises.question: We _____ (visit) Paris next month.
exercises.explanation: 미래 계획: 'are going to visit', 'will visit', 또는 'are visiting' 모두 가능합니다.

exercises.question: She is _____ (work) on a new project.
exercises.explanation: 현재 진행 중인 동작: is working

exercises.question: I _____ (arrive) at 6 PM tomorrow.
exercises.explanation: 미래 시제: 'will arrive' 또는 'am going to arrive'

exercises.question: What is the -ing form of 'leave'?
exercises.explanation: 'leave'는 e로 끝나므로 e를 빼고 -ing를 붙여 'leaving'이 됩니다.

exercises.question: Which sentence expresses future intention?
options: I am going to study English.
exercises.answer: I am going to study English.
exercises.explanation: 'be going to + 동사'는 미래 의도를 표현합니다.

exercises.question: What is the -ing form of 'begin'?
exercises.explanation: 'begin'은 n을 두 번 쓰고 -ing를 붙여 'beginning'이 됩니다.

exercises.question: I'm _____ (move) to a new house next month.
Which adverb shows the lowest frequency?
동사와 -ing 형태를 연결하세요.
exercises.explanation: -ing 형태 규칙: 자음 두 번, e 빼기 등

exercises.question: Which is correct for expressing future plans?
options: I am going to Paris tomorrow.
exercises.answer: I am going to Paris tomorrow.
exercises.explanation: 확정된 미래 계획은 현재 진행형으로 표현할 수 있습니다.

exercises.question: Which adverb shows the highest frequency?
I'm going to _____ (visit) my grandparents.
exercises.explanation: 'be going to + 동사원형'으로 미래 계획을 표현합니다.

exercises.question: Which sentence is correct?
exercises.explanation: 확정된 미래 계획은 현재 진행형으로 표현합니다.

exercises.question: Which is the correct order of frequency?
Which sentence expresses habit?
exercises.explanation: 빈도 부사와 현재 시제로 습관을 표현합니다.

exercises.question: 시간 부사와 시제를 연결하세요.
exercises.explanation: 시간 부사는 특정 시제와 함께 사용됩니다.

exercises.question: Which sentence is correct?
exercises.explanation: 'want'는 상태 동사로 진행형을 잘 쓰지 않습니다.

exercises.question: What is the difference between 'want' and 'need'?
Which sentence uses 'be going to' correctly?
Which word is NOT a frequency adverb?
I _____ (expect) you to come on time.
Which sentence expresses a promise?
options: I promise I will help you.
exercises.answer: I promise I will help you.

exercises.question: _____ you come to my party? (올 거니?)
She is _____ (move) to a new house.
What is the difference between 'probably' and 'maybe'?
빈도 부사와 빈도를 연결하세요.
exercises.explanation: 빈도 부사는 얼마나 자주 하는지를 나타냅니다.

exercises.question: Which sentence is about the future?
Which is NOT correct?
exercises.explanation: 빈도 부사는 보통 be동사 뒤, 일반동사 앞에 옵니다.

exercises.question: 현재 진행형을 사용하는 상황을 연결하세요.
exercises.explanation: 현재 진행형은 현재 행동과 가까운 미래 계획에 사용됩니다.

exercises.question: I _____ (want) to eat pizza.
exercises.explanation: 'want'는 상태 동사로 진행형을 잘 쓰지 않습니다.

exercises.question: Which sentence expresses a plan?
options: I am going to play tennis tomorrow.
exercises.answer: I am going to play tennis tomorrow.

exercises.question: Which sentence is about a future promise?
options: I will help you, I promise.
I help my mom every day.
exercises.answer: I will help you, I promise.
